name: Conveniently Placed Exploding Barrels
description:
Hello there, Welcome to a game about conveniently placed exploding barrels to jump to higher platforms, the game is hard but fun with short levels, and interesting visuals, all made by one person. Experience the latest visuals with Unreal Engine 5, making rapid development also easier.  

During the game you are a ball, who has woken up in a factory, you can roll very fast while also activating the motion blur creating the most interesting visuals. You will find Big Coins, which will increase your health. to fight the bosses at the end.

You will traverse different landscapes during the length of the game and explore their obstacles, and remember that this was made by one person who also keeped a whole life  and highschool while making this.

Like this and want to see this as a full game? Comment below.

Also, sorry that, I could not provide an online version due to Unreal Limitations. Really Sorry

Important:

If, you spawn on a white square, with nothing else just quit the game and restart. This is a bug with Unreal loading some actors first.

Linux Users:

You may see some text in the top left corner, just ignore it. It is a bug from unreal for doing that in shipping versions

FAQ

Q: Why is there no music?

A: It doesn't fit here and would increase the file size, and also I won't be able to finish it in time.

Q: Why is there error/warning text?

A: This is Unreal's mistake for putting it in shipping builds, I was not able to solve it.

Q: The Game is empty with only a white square platform?

A: This is a bug from Unreal not loading an actor quickly enough
